column4: Hi guys.. I'm trying to install the ported version of Alien Vs. Predator, but when I type "make" it says error all over ther place
could anyone please tell me how to install AvP? very badly docimented
documented
Alien vs Predator?
yes
would you have any idea?
does it run natively in Linux, or are you trying to run it in Wine?
according to the bad document from it wine may be used to install some parts of it, but it should be able to run in linux from his port
you got a link to the document?
sure, I'll find the link
this is the guy that's made it, http://icculus.org/avp/ I'll try and find more stuff
the only "guide" I found was a swedish one(I'm swedish too), but it hasn't helped me much... maybe you can see something in it anyway  http://bbs.linux.se/viewtopic.php?t=17379

i don't understand swedish, but it looks like you just download ryan's code with cvs (or svn, as available on his site), and type "make", then run SETUP.EXE with Wine. after it's installed, it looks like you run the 'Avp' shell script (with ./Avp)
Yeah, that was my plan, but when I run "make" it just gives me a huge amount of errors
do you have libSDL 1.2 and libopenal? judging by the links in that guide, those are probably required
I think so, I've got something called libopenal0a according to synaptic and I should have libsdl 1.2
is there a 'README' or 'INSTALL' file that can maybe tell you about other required packages? :X
yeah, tried reading it, but I didn't find anything. Can I post it on pastebin?
Can I post it on pastebin?
sure
http://pastebin.org/39005
sorry, i don't know what to tell you :(
ok, I'd love to post the errors that I get when I type make, but for some reason it's too many errors that "terminal" can't display every line!!
